transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Haanji?

Customer: Ji namaskar sir, Prabhat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, main manager.

Executive: Prabhat, ji boliye.

Customer: Ji, sir ye aapka profile sir Ravinder Singh ke naam se aapne profile start kar rakhi hai.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: So isme sir like main dekh raha tha ki aapka product hai cold storage non reflective suit consultancy services ESIC product bhi kafi achcha hai sir to isme sir aap refund ki demand kar rahe hain sir kafi baar aapne concern me dala hai.

Executive: Sir kya reason kya hai sir bataiye isme?

Customer: Sir reason ek nahi hai waise kai sare hain ab main kaunsa batau?

Executive: Sir conversion batana padega.

Customer: Ek to conversion.

Executive: Sir bilkul sir dekhiye waise refund ka to policy nahi hota lekin aap bhi batayenge us hisab se sir main aage management se discuss karunga ki kya reason hai. Aapke pass pehle bataiye aapke sath sale jab hui thi matlab phone par sale hui thi ya person aaye the aapke pass?

Customer: Phone pe.

Executive: Phone par hui thi na? Thik hai. To sir dekhiye product line bhi achchi hai conversion bhi achcha hai aur rahi baat sir isme abhi tak kya dikkat hai buyleads jo aapne use kiya kaha par issue aaya bataiye?

Customer: Dekho pehli baat to issue ye raha ki jaise maine khud nahi karna tha main dekho company me naukri karta hu aur mera beta tha jo 10vi pass karke 11vi me padh raha tha.

Customer: To wo kya hai ki padhai ke liye usne mana kar diya thoda tevar dikha raha tha tedha chal raha tha maine kaha ek kaam tu padh nahi raha to kaam kar le main tere ko ye kaam karwa dunga.

Customer: To maine dukan khol di product saman dalwa diya aur ye sara maine contact person de diye. Ab 10-15 din baithne ke baad wo mana karne laga matlab do char logo ko call bhi kari to sab takriban hamari taraf se to fake thi main to yahi word use karunga. Kyunki jisko bhi mila aapne use kiya.

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Matlab aapne thoda bahut use karne ki koshish kiya tha ab aap jo hai aap kam karte hain 9 to 6?

Customer: Haanji?

Executive: Work from home karte hain sir matlab office jate hain aap?

Customer: Nahi office jata hu main.

Executive: Achcha office jate hain sir matlab wahi hai ki pure din to aap office me rehta hoga correct?

Customer: Haanji. To maine call kari kuch bachcho ne kari to takriban jisne bhi matlab humne usse baat kari kahi na kahi wo reliable na to bande the na call thi aur na matlab koi product ke regarding humne jo baat karna chahe wo koi ichchuk nahi tha ki sir main to kuch aur dekh raha tha iske bare me search kar raha tha aapke pass kaise chala jayega mere ko nahi pata aap call kar rahe hain. To ek nahi 10-12 logo ko maine jo baat kari recording mode par hamesha hi rehta hai to unki recording me to fir maine aapke yaha issue bhi bheja bhi tha. To wo aisa nikla fir jab ladke ka dimag hatne me isse badhiya to main padhunga main isme jimmedari nahi le sakta sabko utha ke phone karo fir last me pata lage ke koi kuch bhi nahi hai main nahi kar paunga agar shuru me usko ya to paisa dikhai deta to shayad uska man lag bhi jata fir usne kaha main padhunga ab wo padhne ke liye tab usko pressure dala gaya jab paise lagwa diye ab wo ghar me thoda bahut kalesh hone laga uski mummy uski taraf ladne lagi ki padhai ki umar hai tumse kaam karwa rahe ho. To wo padhai ke liye fir maine wo dukan wagera sab bhi hata di. Dukan bhi hata di maine wapas jaha se liya wapas kar diya. Tabhi kya hai? Ab aap saman dalwa lijiye dene ko. Sir main ye soch raha hu. Aapne product kya shuru kiya tha payroll services APF compliances cold storage unit ESIC consultant. Main bata raha hu Accenture us company me HR hu.

Executive: Achcha Accenture me samajh gaya ji ji Accenture me HR hu to kya hai ki jaise iski knowledge mere ko 20-22 saal se hai to 20-22 saal se hai to maine ek do bande apna office bana rakha hai chota sa to wo ladki baith kar kaam karte hain. Payroll wala. To do se matlab partiyan bhi hai hamare pass to unka hum kaam dekhte hain to maine wo bhi isme add kara diya tha chalo wo mere ko mera main tha ladke ka ladke ka chalta rahega to wo ladke ke wala to ho gaya ek tarike se flop usne mana hi kar diya ki main padhunga to wo fir mere ko withdraw karna pada.

Executive: Sir ye to aap jaise HR hai itna achcha experience hai aapko to HR consultancy services se related aap kaam kar sakte hain payroll services hai EPF compliances hai cold storage unit hai to isme multiple product dal ke aap business le sakte hain main ek baar waise discuss karunga aapke sath wo story. Nahi mila wo dekh liya humne karke wo baat kahi nahi banti dikhai di. Jitna humne lead aayi hai wo current mein all India mein dekhta hu to all India mein ek lead aayi hai data bank search ki ek lead aayi hai ek aayi hai oil and gas industry recruitment ki ek HR consultancy services wo alag cheez hai sir recruitment wala system alag hota hai wo cheez nahi karte na hum.

Customer: Achcha recruitment nahi karte hain aap? Nahi nahi.

Executive: Samajh gaya software wagera banate kya HR ke agar software wagera banate aap? Sir isme ye hota hai jaise man lo ke aap ek company hai aapke yaha jo worker kaam kar rahe hain to waha jo kaam kar rahe hain unka ESIC PF salary banana payroll banana ESIC PF ka jama karana is tarah ka kaam jo hota hai as a consultancy ke roop me ye provide karata hu aur mere already hi kareeb 20-22 companiya hai inka hum do ladko se kaam karwa pata hu to wo thik thak chalta hai. Kyunki main is time ko chhod kar ke usme nahi ja sakta kyuki ye mere sath kam se kam 15-20 saal se bane hue customer hai unko dhoka nahi de sakta unka data sara itne saal purana hai mere pass har tarah ki file hai to usko chhod kar usme nahi ja sakta to wo ladke ko karane ke socha tha ab ladko ko 15-16 saal ke bachche hote kaise hai wo aapko shayad ghar me hoga to aapko thoda bahut idea hoga. Bilkul bilkul bilkul sahi baat hai ye situation hai aur rahi baat main ye bhi soch raha tha man lo ki naukri jab tak hai tab tak hai to ho sakta hai ki man lo nahi rahi to kal ko main yahi kaam fir aage badhana chahu to main dobara se join kar lunga lekin situation abhi aisi rahi to fir to main bhi isme invest karne ke liye sochunga nahi na main sochunga aaj lagaya hai chal mera kaam nahi chala main dusra product leke aata hu ya main khud baithta hu to fir dobara join karne ki koshish karunga to mere ko us samne wala sahi lagega reliable banda tabhi to main join karunga nahi pata lage ki main abhi se hi hath jod lunga nahi yaar wo to company me aise hi hai bagair matlab me mere paise lag gaye aur wapas bhi nahi jaldi kaam nahi chala to. Haan sir dekhiye kya refund ki policy to hoti nahi hai but fir bhi main ek baar baat karta hu ki kya genuine reason hai to uske direction agar ho paye to main ek baar dekh leta hu kya ho sakta hai possibility aur aage discuss karta hu dobara to abhi aapka matlab main jo product line abhi to aapka jo product dale hue hain filhal mein jo aapne jo product laye the action jo aap bata rahe ho product bhi aapne hata diye kya pehle abhi aapka product jo dala hai aap kya product kya laye the sir aapne sale karne ke liye wo product bhi dala hua nahi hai abhi waisa to dala hua nahi hai kya product aapne bola tha koi small aap laye the wo maal bhi aapne wo bhej diya ye na to aapke pass hai nahi kya mera achcha ye sab bol rahe hain achcha jo cold storage ka safety jacket aur lower suit ye sab thik hai thik hai thik hai 3000 per piece ye sab maal aapne do char maal laye the to isko kahi se contact kar raha tha sale karane ke liye correct? Ji. Aur fir main ek cheez aur kahunga ke chalo aap baki baat karo refund ke baad jo hai main to abhi filhal wahi karna hai aur agar lagta hai bhavishya mein main dobara kaam chalu karunga to isse jo jacket wala wahi kaam start karunga abhi to filhal naukri ke time nikal jana sahi hai waise main samajh raha hu sir sardiyo me to demand hoti hai jaise man lo aap isko kahi se trading bhi karte ho kahi se maal late ho aur kahi aap isko supply bhi kar sakte hain demand bhi achchi hai product ki sara kuch achcha hai nahi aaya sir isko main jab se dala na abhi tak koi single customer ne koi call nahi kari isne search par nahi kara ha payroll ka jarur kara par payroll usme kai sari cheeze hoti hain to wo koi profile match hi nahi kar raha jo banda search kar raha hai jaise recruitment wale ne search kar liya ya fir koi chinai mistri hai ya kisi type ka thekedar hai wo manpower se sambandh dekh raha hai to jo HR mein consultancy mein usme aur bahut sare wo hai line hai usse sambandhit wo bhi sari colle aa jati hain matlab lead aa jate hain jiska koi mahatva nahi hota to payroll wala to isse bilkul hata hi do hamara waise chal raha koi bahut badhiya hai usi ko nahi hum pura de pa rahe pure din affected bane rehte hain kyuki unhi ka itna kaam hai ki hum unhi ko puri service nahi de pa rahe hain to isliye wo payroll wala to hata hi do samajh gaya payroll wala main aapko polyester cold store jacket wagera ka bhi kaam karna hai aapko ha wahi jacket aapne particular jacket aap winter ke sare product winter ke sare product rakhte hain aap? Hmm? Nahi nahi sare nahi hote sirf single ek hi hota hai usi me hi do teen hote hain jaise man lo reflected wala hai usme size alag alag hai uske color alag alag hai jaise abhi navy blue pada hua tha hamare pass to wo de diya humne usme aasmani hota hai black hota hai ye teen tarah ke hote hain. Hmm hmm. Okay okay. Samajh gaya main samajh gaya matlab abhi wahi hai usme kisi thoda ye product late kahan se sir aap? Silwate hain hum apna achcha khud se manufacturing karwate hain karwate hain fir continue karke dekhiye do teen char mahine sir kuch na kuch result abhi ek saal mein sir jitna paisa lagaya wo to nikal hi jayega kam se kam ye rahega profile bani rahegi visibility achcha rahega sir nahi to agar man lo main ye kahu ki main rakh leta hu isko aur fir kal ko nahi chala hai to fir us case mein kya rahega us case mein refund policy fir hai? Nahi sir refund policy to sir hai nahi jo bhi aap maal baad mein bhi lenge to fir to dekho refund to kahi nahi pata lekin man lo somehow kabhi kabhi aisa kahi kisi customer ka business wrap up kar gaya ya kuch ekdam extra condition hai to us case mein discuss karte hain management mein ki kya ho sakta hai ye cheez hai koi bhi aap discussion kar lo ha discussion karke mere ko batao sir thik hai thik hai sir aur discussion karne ke baad mein jo result hota hai better to aapko refund nahi karna hai aur agar kisi tarike se nahi hota hai to fir mere ko aur bhi ulta paisa fasana padega koi banda bithana padega fir dusre pe vishwas kitna kar sakte hain fir usko start karna dukan chodi hai dukan fir leni padegi maal fir mangana padega usko guidance dukan to aapne koi aas pass me man liya hoga na kahi jaha se maal banwata hu wo to dur hai main rehta hu Rohini sector mein achcha Rohini sector loha se mere office mein log bhi aate hain sir kafi Rohini se dur hai thoda Rohini mein dekha hai Rohini maine aur bolo nahi nahi thik hai aap matlab koi agar aapka janne wala koi aur ho relative mein ho to usko bitha ke chalana sikha dijiye ab man lijiye 10000 12000 salary par mil jaye dukan to sir waha matlab kitne ki milegi thoda sa rent pe dukan laga ke fir thoda sa lagna padega usme business huru karoge na rent hai bahut mahanga pad raha hai jaha jis tarah dukan dekhna sir dekho kahi na kahi aap side mein chota sa business kar bhi rahe hain ek HR ka aapna job bhi kar hi rahe hain ek chota sa business karenge to sab cheeze manage dekho sir aap to khud hi sir intelligent hai itna kar rahe hain abhi chalaane ke liye to chala hi hai ki thoda sa investment jyada karni padegi to chalo fir se ek baar dukan khola ladke ko lagaya to ho gaya wo wali cheez hai sir abhishek sahab aur aur bhi multiple product dal dijiye man lo ye ho gaya kuch aur dal dijiye HR ho gaya mila jula kuch na kuch ghum fir ke kuch to kaam mil hi jayega pure saal mein achcha dekho agar aap khud free ho is kaam ke liye to to samajh mein aata hai dusre ko kitna hum guide karke kitna karwa sakte hain aap samajhdar hai hmm hmm hmm khud ko to bande ko bharosa hota hai par dusre bande pe itna bharosa nahi hota na ki wo hamare liye itna pain lega to aapka san abhi matlab 11th mein admission le liya wo hmm 11th mein jayega na sir aapka san abhi padhai karega matlab 11th mein ha 11th mein hai is bar matlab beech mein sab kuch ho gaya tha to beech mein ekdam se drop kar diya tha ha drop kar diya tha to ye baat hai school chhod study chhod di thi kuch waqt jhagda wagda kara hua tha class mein to usko jane ko kuch nahi lagta apna kaam kar liya sahi to mat ja fir uska dimag ko lat gaya jab kaam ka load pada ke aise aise karna padega bade logo ko bachcha hi to hai bade logo se baaten karne ka idea nahi hai usko ha wo bhi samajh gaya bilkul bilkul ko koi samne wala koi kisi ka nuksan na man pahucha to main kisko kaise face karunga kya jawab dunga apne har baar papa ko thodi office me phone karke papa ye ho gaya wo ho gaya bachcha hi to hai 16 17 saal ka bachcha hota kitna hai ya to khandaani kaam ho to chalo ye hai bachcho ko aur thoda bata diya jata hai hmm hmm hmm samajh gaya chaliye sir thik hai mujhe thoda sa aaj ka time dijiye main discuss karke update karta hu kal aapko ok is number pe call ok thik hai ji
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requesting a refund for subscription.

- No conversion from the leads received.

- Son refused to continue the business.

- Leads received are not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive said refund is not in policy.

- Executive assured to discuss with management.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer after discussion.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, business
